func.title: RemoveEffect

param.name: name
param.desc: Name of the effect without preceding 'Fx'. You can use '*' and '?' wildcards.

param.name: target
param.desc: Target object from which to remove an effect. If nil, the global effects list will be searched.

param.name: effect
param.desc: The effect. Instead to search by name, the effect can be directly removed if this parameter is given.

param.name: no_calls
param.desc: If not false, no Stop calls will be made.

func.remark: See GetEffect for an example. Warning: if an effect is meant to delete itself using this function, only use effect, not name!
